item.title: Just the Basics
item.description: Things have been busy lately, but I’ve been doing some reading, learning, and playing around in a small VM lab, and thought to briefly document what I’ve done. There is unfortunately nothing groundbreaking here, and nothing too interesting beyond a demonstration. ___ ___ _ _ _ _ | \/ | | | | | (_)| | | . . | ___ | |_ __ _ ___ _ __ | | ___ _ | |_ | |\/| | / _ \| __|/ _` |/ __|| '_ \ | | / _ \ | || __| | | | || __/| |_| (_| |\__ \| |_) || || (_) || || |_ \_| |_/ \___| \__|\__,_||___/| .
